name: Furious Rage
description:
Furious Rage is a linear 2D platformer about an unusual hero who finds himself in a strange place. Guide your character through dark locations and don’t let the monsters destroy you! All locations have doors that block your path and levers from them and enemies that will try to interfere.

All game levels consist of several labyrinths separated by doors. Your goal: Find a special lever and unblock your path. At the same time, you need to avoid getting caught by enemies and falling into a pit with spikes!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Varied levels
- Good soundtrack
